titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING OPEN BIOPSY NO RESULT OR INADEQUATE RESULT TOTAL - Description

div.p: OUTCOME OF ASSESSMENT UP TO AND INCLUDING OPEN BIOPSY NO RESULT OR INADEQUATE RESULT TOTAL is the total number of women who have a REFERRAL REQUEST for Biopsy with a PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'Diagnostic Surgery for Histology (Open Biopsy)'.
These women have a BREAST BIOPSY REFERRAL OUTCOME National Code of 'Inconclusive' or 'Biopsy not done or result not yet known' recorded within 6 months of the Breast Screening date.
